definitions.title: vb. Hithp.
definitions.body: act of mourning, poss. roll in (dust, etc. ; weakened fr. burrow into) (NH Pi. break open, or through; As. palâšu, dig a hole; Syr. pla4 dig or break through; but connexion dub., Vrss mostly be-sprinkle oneself, Aq roll oneself);—Pf. I s. [[עָפָר]] [[הִתְפַּלָָּשְׁתִּי]] Mic 1:10 Kt (Qr Imv. [[פַּלָָּשִׁי]]-), others mpl. [[פַּלָָּשׁזּ]]-); Impf. 3 mpl. [[בָּאֵפֶר יִתְפַּלָָּשׁוּ]] Ez Eze 27:30, so Imv. fs. [[הִתֵפַּלֵּשִׁי בָאֵפֶר]] Je 6:26 (cf.Mic 1:10 Qr); abs., mpl. [[הִתֵפַּלְּשׁוּ]] Je 25:34.
